description: Structured data table component for displaying tabular information with headers and rows. Supports responsive layouts and custom cell formatting.
useCase: Use for pricing comparisons, feature matrices, data reports, schedules, product specifications, and any structured data that requires rows and columns.

headers.description: Array of header cell strings for <thead>

rows.description: 2D array of row data, each row is array of cell strings

style.description: Inline CSS styles for table element

class.description: CSS classes for styling (borders, spacing, responsive)

automation.semanticRole: Display structured tabular data with headers and rows
automation.note: Tables are read-only displays. Individual cells are not interactive but the table structure is scrapeable for data extraction.
